thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's Bajaj Finance Dec-Qtr PAT Up About 38 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Bajaj Finance Dec-Qtr PAT Up About 38 Pct
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Bajaj Finance Ltd:
* DEC QUARTER PROFIT AFTER TAX 7.67 BILLION RUPEES * CONSENSUS FORECAST FOR DEC QUARTER PROFIT WAS 7.44 BILLION RUPEES
* DEC QUARTER REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 35.41 BILLION RUPEES * PROFIT AFTER TAX IN DEC QUARTER LAST YEAR WAS 5.56 BILLION RUPEES; REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS WAS 26.88 BILLION RUPEES
* APPROVED FUND RAISING VIA NCDS AS PART OF INCREASE BORROWING LIMIT TO 1 TRLN RUPEES
* APPROVED RAISING OF FUNDS BY ISSUE OF RUPEE DENOMIANTED BONDS IN OVERSEAS MARKET WORTH UP TO 50 BILLION RUPEES ‍​ Source text: bit.ly/2GCbPqw Further company coverage:
